title: Addendum F and G Warning/Flag shouldn't fire on MNC
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club admin or BOC admin/approver user is logged in
AND user has created a new MNC for a player 
AND MNC contains an Addendum F or Addendum G (or both)
custom_steps: WHEN user attemps to save, submit, or approve the MNC
custom_expected:
THEN warning for Add F and G should NOT fire
AND flag for Add F and G should NOT be set or appear on approvals clipboard
Note:For Single Addendum C's these warnings/flags should still fire

title: User Accounts Utility - "Create New User" link
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user has navigated to User Accounts Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks "Request New User" hyperlink
custom_expected:
THEN the modal should appear allowing user to enter First Name, Last Name, and Email
AND if user clicks "Send Request" the new user request email should be sent to the specified address
BUT if user clicks cancel no action should be taken and modal should be dismissed

title: Central Tender Issues
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in with permission to view Central Tender Utility
custom_steps: WHEN user navigates to Central Tender Utility
custom_expected:
THEN all player names should appear (no blanks)
AND user should be able to view the widget for other clubs ONLY IF CURRENT DATE IS AFTER THE TENDER DATE FOR THE YEAR SELECTED
(see https://jira.boc.mlb.com:8443/browse/EBISII-16437 for scenarios)

title: File Attachment zip files not working
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a club or BOC user is logged in
AND user has permission to download and email attach files
AND user is viewing any form in ebis with multiple files Attached
AND user has checked the checkboxes for the files on the form
custom_expected:
THEN system should download a zip file of all the attachments to the users machine
AND user should be able to decompress the zip file and open all the individual attachments
AND the email function should work and send the zip file to the entered email
AND user should be able to open the zip file from the email and decompress to open all attachments
